name: Up Left Out
description: A puzzle game about unlocking stuff.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
